turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to try the iced juniper latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can I get that made with almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: authentic, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering a venti iced juniper latte with almond milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti iced juniper latte with almond milk to be picked up at the starbucks in daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I need it to be in Albuquerque.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me find the starbucks closest to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is the starbucks on san mateo blvd close to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that one's good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to that starbucks, one moment while i see how long it'll be until it's ready for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will be ready for pickup in 8 minutes, your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.
